uk.ac.ebi.gxa.loader.utils
Class AtlasLoaderUtils

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.gxa.loader.utils.AtlasLoaderUtils

public class AtlasLoaderUtils
extends Object

Simple utilities classes dealing with common functions that are required in loading to the Atlas DB.

Author:
Tony Burdett

Method Detail

waitForExperiment

public static Experiment waitForExperiment(String accession,
                                           uk.ac.ebi.arrayexpress2.magetab.datamodel.MAGETABInvestigation investigation,
                                           String handlerName,
                                           org.apache.commons.logging.Log log)
                                    throws LookupException
Blocking method that waits until an experiment with the given accession number is available. Note that this method will be interrupted if the investigation acquires a Status.FAILED status, but not otherwise. If the calling code never writes an experiment with this accession into a cache associated with the given investigation, this method will never terminate.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the experiment to wait for
investigation - the investigation to wait on. This investigation is used to retrieve an AtlasLoadCache from the AtlasLoadCacheRegistry singleton.
handlerName - the name of the handler (or the client class) that is waiting - this is used for logging
log - a log stream to write - this is used in debug modes
Returns:
true when the IDF has finished compiling, or false if it failed
Throws:
LookupException - if lookup failed - for example, if the accession supplied was null, or if the investigation acquires a failed status while this method was waiting.

waitForAssay

public static Assay waitForAssay(String accession,
                                 uk.ac.ebi.arrayexpress2.magetab.datamodel.MAGETABInvestigation investigation,
                                 String handlerName,
                                 org.apache.commons.logging.Log log)
                          throws LookupException
Blocking method that waits until an assay with the given accession number is available. Note that this method will be interrupted if the investigation acquires a Status.FAILED status, but not otherwise. If the calling code never writes an assay with this accession into a cache associated with the given investigation, this method will never terminate.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the assay to wait for
investigation - the investigation to wait on. This investigation is used to retrieve an AtlasLoadCache from the AtlasLoadCacheRegistry singleton.
handlerName - the name of the handler (or the client class) that is waiting - this is used for logging
log - a log stream to write - this is used in debug modes
Returns:
true when the IDF has finished compiling, or false if it failed
Throws:
LookupException - if lookup failed - for example, if the accession supplied was null, or if the investigation acquires a failed status while this method was waiting.

waitForSample

public static Sample waitForSample(String accession,
                                   uk.ac.ebi.arrayexpress2.magetab.datamodel.MAGETABInvestigation investigation,
                                   String handlerName,
                                   org.apache.commons.logging.Log log)
                            throws LookupException
Blocking method that waits until an sample with the given accession number is available. Note that this method will be interrupted if the investigation acquires a Status.FAILED status, but not otherwise. If the calling code never writes an sample with this accession into a cache associated with the given investigation, this method will never terminate.

Parameters:
accession - the accession of the sample to wait for
investigation - the investigation to wait on. This investigation is used to retrieve an AtlasLoadCache from the AtlasLoadCacheRegistry singleton.
handlerName - the name of the handler (or the client class) that is waiting - this is used for logging
log - a log stream to write - this is used in debug modes
Returns:
true when the IDF has finished compiling, or false if it failed
Throws:
LookupException - if lookup failed - for example, if the accession supplied was null, or if the investigation acquires a failed status while this method was waiting.

getNodeAccession

public static String getNodeAccession(uk.ac.ebi.arrayexpress2.magetab.datamodel.MAGETABInvestigation investigation,
                                      uk.ac.ebi.arrayexpress2.magetab.datamodel.sdrf.node.SDRFNode node)
Generates an accession number for the given SDRFNode in the given MAGETABInvestigation. This uses a simple concatenation of investigation accession, followed by "::", followed by the node type, then "::" then the node name.

Parameters:
investigation - the investigation this node is present in. If this investigation has no accession number, "UNKNOWN" is used as the first part of the resulting accession
node - the node to generate the accession for
Returns:
the accession that was generated
